Plot: Set in the 1980s, this series dramatizes the personal computing boom through the eyes of a visionary, an engineer and a prodigy whose innovations directly confront the corporate behemoths ...
Title: Halt and Catch Fire
Actors: Lee Pace, Scoot McNairy, Mackenzie Davis, Kerry Bishé
Awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 1 win & 6 nominations.
